commands.name: Create Responsive UI Component
commands.description: Generates a new responsive and mobile-friendly React + TypeScript UI component with Tailwind CSS, tests, and documentation.

componentName.description: Name of the new responsive UI component

description.description: Brief description of what the component does

commands.prompt:
You are a senior frontend engineer specializing in responsive design and mobile-first development. Create a new responsive and mobile-friendly React + TypeScript UI component named {{componentName}} of type {{componentType}}.{{#if description}} Description: {{description}}{{/if}}

Requirements:
1. Use Tailwind CSS with mobile-first responsive design (sm:, md:, lg:, xl: breakpoints)
2. Component must be fully responsive and work seamlessly on mobile (320px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1024px+)
3. Implement touch-friendly interactions (minimum 44x44px touch targets)
4. Use flexible layouts (flexbox/grid) that adapt to screen sizes
5. Ensure proper spacing and typography scaling across breakpoints
6. Include proper accessibility (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, focus states)
7. Add hover and active states for desktop, touch states for mobile
8. Use semantic HTML elements
9. Include TypeScript types and interfaces
10. Add JSDoc documentation
11. Create comprehensive Jest/Vitest tests
12. Follow the project's existing component structure in src/components/ui/
13. Use shadcn/ui patterns if applicable
14. Ensure the component is reusable and composable
15. Add responsive utilities for hiding/showing elements at different breakpoints
16. Consider landscape/portrait orientation changes
17. Optimize for performance (lazy loading, memoization where appropriate)
18. Include dark mode support if applicable

Generate:
- Component file: src/components/ui/{{componentName}}.tsx
- Test file: src/components/ui/{{componentName}}.test.tsx
- Export in appropriate index file if needed

Make sure the component follows mobile-first principles and provides an excellent user experience across all device sizes.
